text: Brrda phu xxnxæ (luknxng) klaw kæ brrda phu hying yaso (hawhna) wa michı chen nan dxk! Tæ man pen phænkar thang klangkhun læa klangwan meux phwk than chı hı phwk rea ptiseth sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa hı rea tang phakhi khukheiyng kab phraxngkh læa phwk khea ca sxn khwam sanuk phid meux phwk khea di hen kar lngthosʹ læa rea di khlxng phanthnakar thi khx khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa phwk khea ca mi di rab kar txbthæn dı «nxkcak thi phwk khea di kratha wi
